item.title: 人民币有望将十年连涨势头延续至农历新年
item.description: 人民币汇率延续逾十年最长的周度涨势，随着出口商在农历新年来临前增加对人民币的需求，预计人民币将进一步走强。【原文：The Chinese yuan, riding its longest weekly rally in more than a decade, is expected to strengthen further as exporters boost demand for the currency ahead of the Lunar New Year.】

item.title: 特朗普称将于周五上午宣布美联储提名
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示，他将于周五上午宣布美联储主席提名人选，这标志着历时数月的提名过程即将结束。此前，关于这家全球最具影响力的中央银行未来走向的猜测甚嚣尘上。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would be announcing his pick for a nominee to chair the Federal Reserve on Friday morning, signaling an end to a months-long process that has spurred speculation over the future of the world’s most powerful central bank.】

item.title: 调查显示，随着今年加息呼声减弱，欧洲央行维持利率不变
item.description: 欧洲央行预计至少在明年年底前维持利率不变，而关于2026年加息的呼声正在减弱。【原文：The European Central Bank is expected to keep interest rates unchanged at least through the end of next year, with calls for a hike in 2026 receding.】

item.title: 中国债券因银行需求回升而反弹，股市则出现回调
item.description: 中国银行正将过剩资金投入债券市场，推动债券市场复苏，恰逢股市涨势趋缓之际，投资者重新转向政府债券。【原文：Chinese banks are deploying excess cash into the bond market, fueling a recovery just as a cooling stock rally draws investors back to government debt.】

item.title: 香港房地产市场随着城市活力重现而复苏
item.description: 香港饱受困扰的房地产市场正重现生机，这是该市在经历多年低迷后走向复苏的最新迹象。【原文：Hong Kong’s beleaguered housing market is staging a comeback, the latest sign that the city is on the road to recovery following years of gloom.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将取消认证并征收加拿大飞机关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示，他将对在美销售的加拿大飞机征收50%的关税，并取消对该国所有飞机的认证，直至渥太华同意批准美国公司湾流宇航公司生产的部分喷气式飞机。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would charge a 50% tariff on aircraft from Canada sold in the US and decertify all planes made in that country until Ottawa agreed to approve certain jets made by Gulfstream Aerospace Corp., an American firm.】

item.title: 油价在连续三日上涨后趋稳，交易员权衡伊朗风险
item.description: 油价周四飙升逾3%后趋稳，交易员们正权衡美国总统特朗普对伊朗的威胁，以及潜在的敌对行动升级可能对中东地区石油供应造成的影响。【原文：Oil steadied after surging more than 3% on Thursday as traders weighed US President Donald Trump’s threats against Iran, and how a potential escalation in hostilities could impact flows from the Middle East.】

item.title: 为什么有这么多石油？
item.description:
在本周纪录片中，《彭博原创》深入探讨了世界如何陷入供过于求的怪异境地，以及这对未来意味着什么。【原文：

In this weekly documentary, Bloomberg Originals explores how the world got to this strange place of oversupply and what it means for the future.

】

item.title: 瑞典试验发现：人工智能筛查有助于更早发现侵袭性乳腺癌
item.description: 在瑞典一项针对逾十万名女性的试验中，人工智能技术有助于更早发现乳腺癌，并使常规筛查间隔期内出现危险病例的数量减少。【原文：Artificial intelligence helped spot breast cancers earlier and was linked to fewer dangerous cases emerging between routine screenings in a Swedish trial of more than 100,000 women.】

item.title: 金价在震荡盘整后重启涨势，此前强劲涨势暂歇
item.description: 黄金价格在近两周首次下跌后再度上涨，地缘政治动荡以及投资者撤离主权债券和货币市场，推动金价创下历史新高。【原文：Gold resumed gains, after its first drop in nearly two weeks, as geopolitical upheaval and a retreat from sovereign bonds and currencies powered a record-breaking rally.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对向古巴供应石油的国家加征关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普签署行政命令，授权美国对向古巴出售或提供石油的国家所产商品加征关税。这是他近期利用关税手段影响外交政策的最新举措。【原文：President Donald Trump issued an executive order enabling the US to impose levies on products from countries determined to sell or provide oil to Cuba, his latest push to use tariff powers to shape foreign policy.】

item.title: 任天堂Switch 2为何可能面临大幅涨价
item.description: 史上销量最快的游戏主机或许不足以保护任天堂公司的股票免受投资者对内存价格飙升日益加剧的担忧影响。【原文：The fastest-selling game console of all time may not be enough to shelter Nintendo Co.’s stock from growing investor fears about skyrocketing memory prices.】

item.title: 印尼股市经历疯狂一日后，基金公司称最糟糕的还在后头
item.description: 基金经理表示，由明晟公司（MSCI Inc.）投资可操作性警告引发的全球投资者撤离印尼股市的浪潮远未结束，这引发了市场持续估值下调的担忧。【原文：Global investors’ exit from Indonesian stocks sparked by MSCI Inc.’s investability warning is far from done, according to fund managers, raising the specter of a sustained market derating.】

item.title: 曼丹尼警告：华尔街狂欢无法拯救纽约市财政
item.description: 华尔街的繁荣之年不足以避免一场金融危机，市长佐兰·曼达尼称这场危机比十多年前的大衰退更为严重。【原文：Wall Street’s booming year will not be enough to stave off a financial crisis that Mayor Zohran Mamdani says is worse than the Great Recession more than a decade ago.】

item.title: 亚洲股市料谨慎开盘，美股震荡：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘走势料将涨跌互现，此前美国股市震荡交投，市场对人工智能领域巨额投资能否带来足够回报存疑。【原文：Asian stocks looked set for a mixed start following a choppy US session, driven by doubts over whether heavy artificial-intelligence spending will generate sufficient returns.】

item.title: 据称埃隆·马斯克的SpaceX正考虑与特斯拉或xAI合并
item.description: 知情人士透露，SpaceX正考虑与特斯拉公司潜在合并的可能性，同时也在探索与人工智能公司xAI的替代性合作方案。这表明亿万富翁埃隆·马斯克正在权衡如何整合其商业帝国。【原文：SpaceX is considering a potential merger with Tesla Inc., as well as an alternative combination with artificial intelligence firm xAI, according to people familiar with the matter, a sign billionaire Elon Musk is weighing how to consolidate his empire.】

item.title: Perplexity与微软达成人工智能云服务协议，正值其与亚马逊的纠纷之际
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Perplexity与微软公司达成7.5亿美元协议，将使用其Azure云服务。此前该公司与长期云服务合作伙伴亚马逊公司陷入法律纠纷。【原文：AI startup Perplexity inked a $750 million deal with Microsoft Corp. to use its Azure cloud service amid a legal feud with Perplexity’s longtime cloud partner, Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 美国向石油公司发放在委内瑞拉运营的许可证
item.description: 特朗普政府颁布了一项通用许可证，扩大了石油公司在委内瑞拉的运营能力，标志着在美方支持的新领导层执掌加拉加斯后，美国显著放宽了对该国的制裁力度。【原文：The Trump administration issued a general license expanding the ability of oil companies to operate in Venezuela, marking a significant to step ease sanctions under the new US-backed leadership in Caracas.】

item.title: 苹果销售额超预期，iPhone创下季度销售纪录
item.description: 苹果公司假日季度营收远超华尔街预期，主要得益于新款iPhone 17的强劲需求、服务业务的增长以及中国市场的复苏。【原文：Apple Inc.’s revenue in the holiday quarter trounced Wall Street estimates, driven by strong demand for the new iPhone 17, growth in services and a rebound in China.】

item.title: 美国敦促中国让"严重低估"的人民币升值
item.description: 美国财政部称人民币汇率“严重低估”，并呼吁中国允许人民币汇率及时有序地升值。【原文：The US Treasury characterized the yuan as “substantially undervalued,” and called on China to allow its exchange rate to strengthen in a timely and orderly way.】

item.title: 美国已调查有关WhatsApp聊天不私密的指控
item.description: 据彭博新闻社采访及一份特工报告显示，尽管Meta公司宣称其聊天服务具有私密性和加密性，但美国执法部门一直在调查前Meta平台公司承包商的指控——称Meta员工能够访问WhatsApp消息。【原文：US law enforcement has been investigating allegations by former Meta Platforms Inc. contractors that Meta personnel can access WhatsApp messages, despite the company’s statements that the chat service is private and encrypted, according to interviews and an agent’s report seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 硅谷政策论坛将强调保持美国在人工智能领域的领先地位
item.description: 据主办方透露，备受瞩目的科技行业领袖与美国政策制定者聚会——山谷论坛，将在华盛顿举行的下一届峰会上聚焦两大议题：维护美国在人工智能领域的领先地位，以及拓展先进制造业版图。【原文：The Hill and Valley Forum, a closely watched gathering of tech industry leaders and US policymakers, will focus its next summit in Washington on preserving the American lead in artificial intelligence and expanding advanced manufacturing, according to the organizers.】

item.title: 五角大楼与加拿大5N Plus达成协议
item.description: 美国国防部向加拿大5N Plus公司投资1800万美元，助力该公司扩建金属锗精炼产能。该金属广泛应用于夜视系统等领域。受此消息影响，该公司股价飙升19%。【原文：The US Department of Defense made an $18 million investment in Canada’s 5N Plus Inc. to help the company expand refining capacity for germanium metal, which is used in night-vision systems and other applications. The shares soared 19%.】

item.title: 联邦快递股价创2021年以来新高，得益于成本削减计划
item.description: 联邦快递公司股价收于历史新高，有望延续六个月的涨势。市场对其成本削减措施信心日益增强，加之经济环境表现强韧，预计将利好运输行业。【原文：FedEx Corp. shares closed at a record high, putting them on track for a six-month rally amid growing confidence in the company’s cost-cutting efforts and a resilient economic backdrop that’s expected to favor the transportation sector.】

item.title: 病毒式应用Moltbot展现人工智能代理未来的残缺图景
item.description: 开发者、风险投资家和早期采用者都迫不及待地试用了该产品。【原文：Developers, venture capitalists and early adopters have eagerly tested out the product】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，亚马逊正与OpenAI洽谈，拟投资高达500亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，亚马逊公司正与OpenAI洽谈投资事宜，投资额可能高达500亿美元。这笔交易将加速全球最大云计算服务提供商与领先人工智能工具开发商之间的合作关系。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is in talks to invest as much as $50 billion in OpenAI, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, a deal that would accelerate ties between the world’s largest cloud-computing provider and the leading builder of AI tools.】

item.title: 苹果财报将揭示iPhone需求及人工智能战略
item.description: 纽约第五大道苹果专卖店。摄影师：迈克尔·纳格尔/彭博社【原文：The Apple Fifth Avenue store in New York. Photographer: Michael Nagle/Bloomberg】

item.title: 太平洋投资管理公司总裁称私募信贷买家对风险"视而不见"
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司表示，投资者在追逐私人信贷领域丰厚收益时，往往低估了其中的风险。【原文：Investors underestimate the hazards when chasing fat yields in private credit, according to Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: Grubhub将免除50美元以上餐厅订单的费用
item.description: Grubhub宣布免除所有超过50美元的餐厅订单的配送费和服务费，这是这家新近私有化的外卖应用为从竞争对手DoorDash和优步手中吸引顾客所采取的最新举措。【原文：Grubhub is removing delivery and service fees on all restaurant orders above $50, the latest move by the newly private food-delivery app to lure customers from rivals DoorDash Inc. and Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 路透社报道：SpaceX在IPO前与xAI进行合并谈判
item.description: 路透社报道称，在火箭和卫星制造商SpaceX即将进行重磅IPO之际，其创始人埃隆·马斯克正与旗下人工智能公司xAI商讨潜在合并事宜。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX is in discussions with his artificial intelligence firm xAI about a potential merger ahead of the rocket and satellite maker’s potential blockbuster IPO, Reuters reported.】
